item.description: SINGLES WALK and LUNCH at the MDC Reservoir No. 6 in West Hartford at 11 am. We?ll walk the Metacomet trail around the reservoir. Join us for a Sunday morning walk and then onto lunch at a local restaurant. No charge for walk. For info, call Gail 860-582-8229. Directions: I-84 Exit 43 (Park Road), end of ramp turn right, at light turn left onto Trout Brook Drive, follow 2.3 miles to light, left onto Albany Ave., go 2.4 miles, reservoir on right, turn in for 1.3 miles to back area, at 3-way split go left to additional parking. We?ll meet there.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for person holding Social Connections sign in the parking lot.
item.why: You'll love it because we offer a relaxed, comfortable, welcoming atmosphere for you and other singles to socialize and have fun!

group.who: Come join us for a FUN time!
group.name: Singles Social Connections

item.name: Singles Walk & Lunch
